CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 13, 1960, pg. 28 reads: "Jones and the Mrs. - San Francisco Giants' pitcher, Sam Jones, and his wife, Mary, had a chance to renew Pittsburgh friendships over the week-end when they visited here for the Dapper Dan banquet. Jones was one of three tan athletes honored at the fete. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left: Mary Jones, San Francisco Giants pitcher Sam Jones, unknown woman, Hank Aaron, and unknown woman, seated on light colored sofa behind coffee table with plant, eyeglasses, and book in living room interior
